abstract: United States Central Command confirms American-trained rebel commander in Syria gave American ammunition and trucks to Al Nusra Front, offshoot of Al Qaeda, in exchange for safe passage through area group controls; statement comes even as Centcom is facing scrutiny and criticism from Congress over its training program in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Military officials, who days before had denied reports of the handover, called the disclosure “very concerning” and a violation of guidelines.

headline.main: U.S. Says Rebel It Trained Surrendered Matériel in Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Rebel It Trained Surrendered Matériel in Syria
